articles.description: Man City made it 21 straight with a 4-1 victory over Wolves and as good as they've been this year, there's a chance they may be even stronger next.
articles.content:
MANCHESTER, England -- The frightening thing for the rest of the Premier League is that Pep Guardiola thinks Manchester City can get even better.
The numbers are scary enough as it is. After a 4-1 v… [+4219 chars]

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Rob James becomes second jockey this week to apologise after footage emerges of him sitting on dead horse - ABC News
articles.description: Irish amateur jockey Rob James says he is "heartbroken" after footage of him climbing onto a dead horse circulated on social media.
articles.content:
A second jockey has been forced to apologise after footage emerged of him sitting on a dead horse.
